episodes.title: Watchtower Victims Memorial Day 2016
episodes.description:
Watchtower Victims Memorial Day
26th July 2016.

Blyth Kingdom Hall of Jehovah's Witnesses.

The Watchtower organisation is an iron fist in a velvet glove.

These are some examples of people who I consider to be victims of the tyrannical Watchtower organisation.

Although I don't name names, I am talking about living examples that some local JW's may be able to identify.
Therefore I have purposely avoided examples of child sex/domestic violence abuse.

I tried to film this at a quiet time of day.
The unexpected arrival of the Circuit Overseer was a bonus.

episodes.title: Shunning - How Jehovah's Witnesses Treat You If You Dare To Leave
episodes.description:
This video is in 2 parts.

First of all I recount some of my experiences of being shunned by people I have been friends with for over 2 decades.
The ONLY reason these 'true christians' shun me is that I dared to leave the Watchtower organisation.

The second part of the video was unplanned. (It starts at 22m 40s)
I filmed the entire video while a meeting was taking place.
At the end of the meeting an announcement was made warning the congregation that I was outside and NOT to talk to me, or to be afraid!!!

episodes.title: Why I left the Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description:
This is way longer than I intended :(

It describes how I became involved with the Jehovah's Witnesses and how I came to leave after 22 years.
